dict.string: From the Pose Tabs press, hold, and drag Poses to the Sequence Canvas. Notice the color coding of the Poses: Blue = calming, Red = energizing, Yellow = neutral.
Move Poses around within the Sequence Canvas or drop a pose back into the tabs area. Notice the time and poses accumulate.
...or customize your Transition speed using the Speed Button and Slider. First Transition Slide remains 4 seconds.
